title: (Sorry if this doesn't belong here) Keen: Modding down?
content: Is it just me or is Keen: Modding down? It gives me some error message about an "IISPassword" when I try to access it...

title: Downtime
content:
Yes, that appears to be the case. It looks like [url=http://www.durdin.net]www.durdin.net[/url] is still alive and well, but [url=http://andy.durdin.net]andy.durdin.net[/url] is down for the time being.
This has happened before, when Andy's relatives updated the server in some way that twisted things up. This is likely something similar; just give it some time.

title: Re: Downtime
content:
Ah. Yeah, I'll give it some time. It's good to know nothing's wrong with my computer. But too bad it's down, there's been another post in the Norp the Yorp thread that I wanted to read. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ------------------
www.ericmushroomwilson.co.uk My website is going to go back online
[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: Downtime
content:
Just noticed this now..

How long do you think it will take to become online again?

---Freeyorp

title: Re: Downtime
content:
Yeah; the settings and such have become incompatible with the new family server so until they're fixed, no K:M
